::Autofire::

The panel closes and the machine's engines get slightly louder while 
it proccesses the energon, turning part of it into energon cubes and 
using the rest for energy.

"Allright, let's go." Autofire says, getting into the pod and waiting 
for Megatron to enter. A panel slides aside on the control panel, 
revealing some energon cubes. Autofire takes two and drains them, 
leaving the panel open for Megatron to recharge more. They might as 
well be well-powered in case of battle.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Megatron dumps the energon into the machine, "Yes, I think that 
would be
> wise" he responds towards the recon Idea.
